comment:
* A factory function that generates, defines and returns the proxy class given
     * the ClassLoader and array of interfaces.

variables.name: proxyClassNamePrefix
variables.comment: prefix for all proxy class names

variables.name: nextUniqueNumber
variables.comment: next number to use for generation of unique proxy class names

methods.name: public Class<?> apply(ClassLoader loader, Class<?>[] interfaces)

methodNames: public Class<?> apply(ClassLoader loader, Class<?>[] interfaces)
